#Text=Montreal/Côte-des-Neiges
#Text=Côte-des-Neiges is a multicultural neighbourhood in Montreal .
#Text=The area is highly influenced by its proximity to the Universite de Montreal .
#Text=The crowd is highly composed of students and immigrants .
#Text=The Saint Joseph Oratory perches above the district .
#Text=Metro
#Text=You can reach Côte-des-Neiges from the Côte-des-Neiges and Université de Montreal Metro stations on the Blue Line and Côte Ste-Catherine and Snowdon stations on the Orange Line .
#Text=By bus
#Text=The 161 Van Horne runs from Rosemont metro , at the far north of the Plateau .
#Text=From the south-west of the Plateau the 129 Côte-Ste-Catherine follows the edge of Mont Royal through Outremont .
#Text=165 Côte-des-Neiges covers the north-south route from Downtown .
#Text=See
#Text=St. Joseph 's Oratory ( Oratoire Saint-Joseph ) , 3800 Chemin Queen Mary ( métro Côte-des-Neiges ) , ☏ +1 514-733-8211 .
#Text=The largest church in Canada , it is a favourite pilgrimage for devotees of Brother André , who was reputed to have healed the sick and handicapped .
#Text=Includes a remarkable collection of crutches and canes from the healed .
#Text=During the summer , it is also possible to stroll through the beautiful garden next to the Oratory which features the Stations of the Cross in marble sculptures .
#Text=The garden is peaceful and beautifully maintained .
#Text=The views from both the Oratory and the garden are magnificent and well-worth the climb .
#Text=Watch for the faithful climbing on their knees to the top .
#Text=Cemeteries .
#Text=Wander among the more than one million graves covering the north slope of Mont Royal .
#Text=No bikes or picnicking :
#Text=Mount-Royal Cemetery , 1297 Chemin de la Forêt , H2V 2P9 , ☏ +1514 279-7358 .
#Text=Notre-Dame-des-Neiges Cemetery , 4601 Chemin de la Côte-des-Neiges .
#Text=One of the largest cemeteries in Canada .
#Text=Université de Montréal , 2900 boul Édouard-Montpetit ( métro Université de Montréal or Édouard-Montpetit ) .

#Text=The second largest university in Canada in terms of students , Université de Montréal is a French speaking university whose campus is mostly concentrated on the mount Royal , between the metro stations Edouard-Montpetit and Côte-des-Neiges .
#Text=The Roger-Gaudry building , with it 's tall tower and Art Deco architecture , is well worth a look .
#Text=It is situated just in front of the metro station Université-de-Montréal .
#Text=Free .
#Text=The Montreal Holocaust Memorial Centre , 1 Carré Cummings Square ( 5151 Chemin de la Côte-Sainte – Catherine ) , ☏ +1 514-345-2605 .
#Text=The Montreal Holocaust Memorial Centre ( MHMC ) is dedicated to Holocaust education and awareness .
#Text=It was founded in 1979 by a group of Holocaust survivors .
#Text=The Centre 's mandate is to educate people of all ages and backgrounds about the genocidal murder of six million Jews by Nazi Germany and its collaborators between 1933-1945 .
#Text=Do
#Text=The Segal Centre for Performing Arts ( was Saydie Bronfman Center ) , 5170 Chemin de la Côte-Sainte-Catherine , ☏ +1514 739-2301 , fax : +1514 739-9340 .
#Text=Sun-Thu 10AM-4PM .
#Text=Piscine Cote-des-Neiges , 4880 avenue Van Horne , ☏ +1 514-342-9988 .
#Text=Indoor swimming pool .
#Text=Free .
#Text=Picnic in the park ( square between Gatineau , Swail , Decelle and Jean-Brillant ) .
#Text=Relax in the park with your lunch .
#Text=There are several grocery stores nearby , as well as tons of restaurants who offer take out ( mostly on Gatineau and Côte-des-Neiges ) .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Plaza Côte-des-Neiges , 6700 chemin de la Côte-des-Neiges ( metro Plamondon and Côte-Des-Neiges ) .
#Text=Mon - Wed 10AM-6PM , Thu-Fri 10AM-9PM , Sat - Sun 10AM-5PM .
#Text=Over 100 shops and services plus Cinema Odeon movie theater .
#Text=Victoria Ave ( Plamondon Metro ) .
#Text=Queen Mary Road ( Snowdon Metro ) .
#Text=Côte-des-Neiges road ( metro Côte-des-Neiges ) .
#Text=Eat
#Text=The multicultural communities of Côte-des-Neiges are all well represented on the dining scene .
#Text=This is the place to come for Kosher , Lebanese , Caribbean , Tamil , Vietnamese , Filipino , Russian and even Romanian cuisine .
#Text=Cheap eats line Queen Mary , Decarie , Victoria and Côte-des-Neiges avenue .
#Text=Kosher
#Text=Chez Benny , 5071 ch Queen Mary ( between ave de Westbury and rue Lemieux ; metro Snowdon , bus 17 , 51 or 166 ) , ☏ +1514 735-1836 .
#Text=Winter : Su - Th 11AM-11PM , F 11AM-Shabbat time , Sa after Shabbat-3AM ; Summer : Su - Th 11AM-midnight , F 11AM-Shabbat time ; Sa after Shabbat-1AM .
#Text=Kosher restaurant with Mediterranean ( shawarma , falafel , merguez and the likes ) and Chinese dishes .
#Text=Really busy on weekend evenings .
#Text=Ernie 's and Ellie 's Place , 6900 boul Décarie ( in the mall ) , ☏ +1 514-344-4444 .
#Text=Kosher meat restaurant .
#Text=Everything goes : Russian , Chinese , Moroccan , you name it .
#Text=Regular " Canadian " kitchen is n't bad either .
#Text=Food served very quickly .
#Text=Decor is trying to be nice but misses some edge .
#Text=It does n't matter though , because this place gets customers no matter what happens .
#Text=Exception 2 , 5039 ch Queen Mary ( between ave de Westbury and rue Lemieux ; metro Snowdon , bus 17 , 51 or 166 ) , ☏ +1514 344-0508 .
#Text=Su - Th 8AM-9PM , F 8AM-2PM .
#Text=Kosher restaurant with pizza , pasta , salads , sushi . fish , and more .
#Text=Expresti gourmet , 5335A chemin Queen Mary ( Cornrer Coolbrook ) , ☏ +1 514-482-6688 .
#Text=Italian , Dairy and Parve
#Text=Pizza Pita , 6415 boul Décarie ( between ave Plomondon and ave Van Horne ; metro Plamondon , bus 17 , 160 , or 161 ) , ☏ +1514 731-7482 .
#Text=Su - Th 7:30AM-11PM , F 7:30AM-1 hr before Shabbat , Sa 1 hr after Shabbat-4AM .
#Text=Kosher ( and Cholov Yisroel ) pizzas , pita sandwiches , burgers .
#Text=Falafels are generously stuffed and fried eggplants give a tasty twist .
#Text=Very popular with high schoolers and the frum set , especially on Saturday nights .
#Text=One of the best veggie pizzas in Montreal .
#Text=Pizzeria Tatty , 6540 ave de Darlington ( at ave Barclay ; bus 160 or 161 ) , ☏ +1514 734-8289 .
#Text=Kosher pizzeria .
#Text=The Reserve , 5395 ch Queen Mary ( between ave Earnscliffe and ave Coolbrook ; metro Snowdon , bus 17 , 51 , 63 , 129 , or 166 ) , ☏ +1514 481-3111 .
#Text=Su - Th 5PM-10PM .
#Text=Kosher steakhouse and tavern .
#Text=Halal
#Text=Halal 786 Restaurant , 768 Jean Talon Ouest , ☏ +1 514-270-0786 .
#Text=Budget
#Text=Exception 2 , 5047 , chemin Queen-Mary , ☏ +1 514-344-0508 .
#Text=Kosher dairy restaurant featuring thin crust pizzas .
#Text=Chez Jolee , 5495 , ave .
#Text=Delicious Sri Lankan and South Indian meals and snacks , including dosa , kottu roti , string hoppers , idli , vada and more .
#Text=Al Amine , 3549 ave .
#Text=Typical Montreal style " shish taouk " ( chicken shawarma ) Lebanese restaurant .
#Text=Delicious and rather healthy fast food .
#Text=They have great vegetarian/vegan options ( falafel , vegetarian platter ) , pizza by the slice and Lebanese baklava . 2$-10$ .
